definition: the 60th part of an hour of time : 60 seconds
the 60th part of a degree of angular measure
examples: Its latitude is 41 degrees 55 minute north.

definition: the distance one can traverse in a minute
examples: Five minutes down the road is a gas station.

definition: a short space of time : moment
examples: Dinner will be ready in just a few minutes.

definition: a brief note (as of summary or recommendation)
examples: He received a minute of instructions.
sent the president a minute explaining the problem

definition: the official record of the proceedings of a meeting
examples: The secretary read the minutes of the previous meeting.

definition: marked by close attention to details
to make notes or a brief summary of
